name: Generate Fix
description: Generate code, test, and documentation fixes for anomalies

movements.name: Generate Fix

beats.title: Generation Requested
beats.scenario: Generate or Create generate Fix Requested
acceptanceCriteria:
Given the generateFixRequested operation is triggered
When the handler executes
Then it completes successfully within < 2 seconds
And the output is valid and meets schema
And any required events are published

Given valid input parameters
When generateFixRequested processes them
Then results conform to expected schema
And no errors are thrown
And telemetry events are recorded with latency metrics

Given error conditions
When generateFixRequested encounters an error
Then the error is logged with full context
And appropriate recovery is attempted
And the system remains stable

Given performance SLA of < 2 seconds
When generateFixRequested executes
Then latency is consistently within target
And throughput meets baseline requirements
And resource usage stays within bounds

Given compliance and governance
When generateFixRequested operates
Then all governance rules are enforced
And audit trails capture execution
And no compliance violations occur
beats.testCase: should achieve the desired business outcome
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want generateFixRequested to execute reliably with latency < 2 seconds so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

movements.userStory: As an SRE, I need fix generation to produce candidate patches and run validation with ≤2s P95, with audit trails.
movements.businessValue: Accelerates content creation; reduces manual effort by 40%; enables bulk operations; improves developer productivity
